Get the cheapest shipping rates for free!
Start shipping at www.pirateship.com
Pirate Ship automatically rate shops between Priority Mail Cubic and Weight-Based. The services have the same 1-3 day delivery and $100 insurance.
Packages exceeding 1 cubic foot are charged the dimensional weight (Length x Width x Height / 166) if greater than the actual weight.
BELOW Commercial Pricing - The cheapest rates available for this service!
No Monthly Fees - No Markups - No Minimums - Pirate Ship is FREE because we get paid by the carriers, not by you!
USPS won't let us advertise the secret highlighted rates because they're UP TO $1.67 CHEAPER than Commercial Pricing!
